SELECT pbl.libraryName pLibraryName, bl.libraryName, bs.sampleNum, bs.sampleNo, bs.position, bs.sort, bs.amount, bs.gainTime, bs.storageTime, br.createTime checkApplyTime, br.updateTime assignMissionTime, bs.sampleTime, bs.remark, bm.length, bm.wide, bm.high, bm.deductVolume, bm.realVolume, bm.realCapacity, bm.correctioFactor, bm.aveDensity, bm.unQuality, bm.grainQuality, bm.slip FROM barn_library pbl LEFT JOIN barn_library bl ON bl.pLibraryId = pbl.id LEFT JOIN barn_register br ON br.libraryId = bl.id LEFT JOIN barn_sample bs ON bs.pId = br.id LEFT JOIN barn_manuscript bm ON bm.sampleId = bs.id
where bs.id=#{id}
